metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10154 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The smbhash function in fs/cifs/smbencrypt.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.xbefore 4.9.1 interacts incorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, whichallows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash or memorycorruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact by leveraging use ofmore than one virtual page for a scatterlist.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
